exchangeLuckyballComment: You have redeemed your points for a Lucky Ball.
inviteLuckyballComment: You have received a Lucky Ball for inviting a friend.
purchaseGiftCardByPoint: You've redeemed points for a gift card.
purchaseProductByPoint: You've redeemed your points for merchandise.
luckyDrawUseBallComment: You have used the Lucky Ball to enter the Lucky Draw.
winLotteryPointComment: You have been awarded points for winning the Lotto.
partnerMailContents1: Please check the documents required for partner approval and send a reply with the file attached!
partnerMailContents3:
Please attach a copy of your ID card or passport
to verify your partner's identity.
partnerMailContents5:
Please check the documents and information required
for partner approval and send us a reply!
partnerMailContents6: (Transaction type, routing number, account number, account holder's first name, middle name, last name, recipient's mobile phone number, etc.)
partnerMailContents8:
Please send us a phone number where you can be reached
to communicate with your partner.
partnerMailContents9:
Please send your response by email to partner@buflexz.com.
After the operation team checks the response, partner screening and approval will be processed.
authMailContents1: We will send you an email authentication number.
authMailContents3: An authentication key has been issued for email authentication.
authMailContents4:
Please enter the 6-digit authentication number directly into the authentication
window within the app or copy and paste the authentication number.
authMailContents5:
This email is for sending only.
Replies are not possible, so if you have any questions or inconveniences,
please contact us through the customer center within the BUFLEXZ app.
joinRecommendPointContents: Points were given as a recommended membership gift.
joinRecommendBallContents: Lucky balls were given as a recommended membership gift.
invitePointComment: Points were paid as a friend's invitation.
attendancePointComment: Points were paid for attendance check.
rewardPointComment: Points were awarded as advertising compensation.
